name: The Absolute Best Potato Soup
author: CMATLOCK
summary: This is the absolute best and easiest potato soup. I never liked potato soup until I made this for my wife.  Everyone I have shared it with loves it.  It is quick, easy, and good on a nice winter day.
ingredients: 1 (49.5 fluid ounce) can chicken broth, divided
1 (1 ounce) package country style gravy mix (such as McCormick®)
2 (1/2 inch thick) slices deli ham, diced
directions: Pour 1 cup of the chicken broth, and the contents of the gravy mix packet, into a small bowl
Combine potatoes, carrot, onion, ham, and remaining chicken broth in a large soup pot; bring to a boil
Cook for 5 minutes, and turn down to a simmer
Whisk in the broth and gravy mixture
